From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
And, even, also, namely.
Dominion, strength, power; a mighty deed. Perhaps a primary word; vigor.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

14.str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Four. Or neuter tessara a plural number; four.
An animal, living creature. Neuter of a derivative of zao; a live thing, i.e. An animal.

14.parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
14.str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Comparative of presbus; older; as noun, a senior; specially, an Israelite Sanhedrist or Christian 'presbyter'.

14.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
14.str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.

14.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
14.str2: From pros and a probable derivative of kuon; to fawn or crouch to, i.e. prostrate oneself in homage.
